1. Create directory ".github"
2. Create directory "workflows"
3. in directory "workflows" create "github-actions-demo.yml" file
   as result should be ..\restapinote\.github\workflows\github-actions-demo.yml
4. Fill the file with text from https://docs.github.com/ru/actions/quickstart or read
    https://docs.github.com/en/actions/automating-builds-and-tests/building-and-testing-java-with-gradle
   and step by step perform all article for create new gradle.yml file with correct.
